context: <a2_0><b6_0><b7_0>Eleven days<b7_0/><b6_0/><a2_0/> after the Soviet invasion of the Polish Kresy, the secret protocol of the Molotov–Ribbentrop Pact was modified by the <a1_0><b5_0>German–Soviet Treaty of Friendship, Cooperation and Demarcation<b5_0/><a1_0/>,) allotting <a0_0><b3_0><b4_0>Germany<b4_0/><b3_0/><a0_0/> a larger part of Poland and transferring Lithuania's territory (with the exception of left bank of river Scheschupe, the "Lithuanian Strip") from the envisioned German sphere to the Soviets.
